DataElement.preferredName: Lymphomatous Involvement of Extranodal Site Testis Present Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether or not there is extranodal lymphomatous spread to the testes.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Lymphomatous Involvement of Extranodal Site Testis Present
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A pathologic and/or clinical finding indicating the spread of a lymphomatous process to an anatomic site other than lymph nodes._Either of the paired male reproductive glands that produce the male germ cells and the male hormones._Being or existing in a specified place or at the specified time.
